description:
Lectures and laboratory classes providing a conceptual and practical introduction to the neural mechanisms and performance characteristics of human movement production and motor learning.
This course had the previous code of HMST7530 which can be viewed in the archived area within the Course and Program site http://www.uq.edu.au/study/archive/index.html
incompatible: HM253 or 254 or 255 or HMST2530; HMST7530; NEUR2530
